Package BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors

Class CANdleFaultsWrapper

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors.CANdleFaultsWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
FaultsWrapper
public class CANdleFaultsWrapper extends Object implements FaultsWrapper
Wrapper class for monitoring and handling faults in a CANdle device. Provides functionality to check for faults and activate or deactivate corresponding alerts.

      Specified by:
